00051 /*\{*/
00052 #define SMC_CFG_OFF         0x000  ///< NFC Configuration
00053 #define SMC_CTRL_OFF        0x004  ///< NFC Control
00054 #define SMC_SR_OFF          0x008  ///< NFC Status
00055 #define SMC_IER_OFF         0x00C  ///< NFC Interrupt Enable
00056 #define SMC_IDR_OFF         0x010  ///< NFC Interrupt Disable
00057 #define SMC_IMR_OFF         0x014  ///< NFC Interrupt Mask
00058 #define SMC_ADDR_OFF        0x018  ///< NFC Address Cycle Zero
00059 #define SMC_BANK_OFF        0x01C  ///< Bank Address
00060 #define SMC_ECC_CTRL_OFF    0x020  ///< ECC Control
00061 #define SMC_ECC_MD_OFF      0x024  ///< ECC Mode
00062 #define SMC_ECC_SR1_OFF     0x028  ///< ECC Status 1
00063 #define SMC_ECC_PR0_OFF     0x02C  ///< ECC Parity 0
00064 #define SMC_ECC_PR1_OFF     0x030  ///< ECC parity 1
00065 #define SMC_ECC_SR2_OFF     0x034  ///< ECC status 2
00066 #define SMC_ECC_PR2_OFF     0x038  ///< ECC parity 2

00217 /*\{*/
00218 #define NFC_CMD_CMD1           (0xFF <<  2)  ///< Command Register Value for Cycle 1
00219 #define NFC_CMD_CMD2           (0xFF << 10)  ///< Command Register Value for Cycle 2
00220 #define NFC_CMD_VCMD2          BV(18)        ///< Valid Cycle 2 Command
00221 #define NFC_CMD_ACYCLE_SHIFT   19
00222 #define NFC_CMD_ACYCLE_MASK    (0x7 << 19)   ///< Number of Address required for the current command
00223 #define NFC_CMD_ACYCLE_NONE    (0x0 << 19)   ///< No address cycle
00224 #define NFC_CMD_ACYCLE_ONE     (0x1 << 19)   ///< One address cycle
00225 #define NFC_CMD_ACYCLE_TWO     (0x2 << 19)   ///< Two address cycles
00226 #define NFC_CMD_ACYCLE_THREE   (0x3 << 19)   ///< Three address cycles
00227 #define NFC_CMD_ACYCLE_FOUR    (0x4 << 19)   ///< Four address cycles
00228 #define NFC_CMD_ACYCLE_FIVE    (0x5 << 19)   ///< Five address cycles
00229 #define NFC_CMD_CSID_SHIFT     22            ///< Chip Select shift
00230 #define NFC_CMD_CSID_MASK      (0x7 << NFC_CMD_CSID_SHIFT)   ///< Chip Select mask
00231 #define NFC_CMD_NFCEN          BV(25)        ///< NFC Enable
00232 #define NFC_CMD_NFCWR          BV(26)        ///< NFC Write Enable
00233 #define NFC_CMD_NFCCMD         BV(27)        ///< NFC Command Enable
00234 /*\}*/

00240 /*\{*/
00241 #define SMC_CFG_PAGESIZE_SHIFT       0
00242 #define SMC_CFG_PAGESIZE_MASK        (0x3 << SMC_CFG_PAGESIZE_SHIFT)
00243 #define SMC_CFG_PAGESIZE_PS512_16    (0x0 << 0)
00244 #define SMC_CFG_PAGESIZE_PS1024_32   (0x1 << 0)
00245 #define SMC_CFG_PAGESIZE_PS2048_64   (0x2 << 0)
00246 #define SMC_CFG_PAGESIZE_PS4096_128  (0x3 << 0)
00247 #define SMC_CFG_WSPARE               (0x1 << 8)
00248 #define SMC_CFG_RSPARE               (0x1 << 9)
00249 #define SMC_CFG_EDGECTRL             (0x1 << 12)
00250 #define SMC_CFG_RBEDGE               (0x1 << 13)
00251 #define SMC_CFG_DTOCYC_SHIFT         16
00252 #define SMC_CFG_DTOCYC_MASK          (0xf << SMC_CFG_DTOCYC_SHIFT)
00253 #define SMC_CFG_DTOCYC(value)        (SMC_CFG_DTOCYC_MASK & ((value) << SMC_CFG_DTOCYC_SHIFT))
00254 #define SMC_CFG_DTOMUL_SHIFT         20
00255 #define SMC_CFG_DTOMUL_MASK          (0x7 << SMC_CFG_DTOMUL_SHIFT)
00256 #define SMC_CFG_DTOMUL_X1            (0x0 << 20)
00257 #define SMC_CFG_DTOMUL_X16           (0x1 << 20)
00258 #define SMC_CFG_DTOMUL_X128          (0x2 << 20)
00259 #define SMC_CFG_DTOMUL_X256          (0x3 << 20)
00260 #define SMC_CFG_DTOMUL_X1024         (0x4 << 20)
00261 #define SMC_CFG_DTOMUL_X4096         (0x5 << 20)
00262 #define SMC_CFG_DTOMUL_X65536        (0x6 << 20)
00263 #define SMC_CFG_DTOMUL_X1048576      (0x7 << 20)

00381 #define SMC_TIMINGS_TWB_SHIFT      24
00382 #define SMC_TIMINGS_TWB_MASK       (0xf << SMC_TIMINGS_TWB_SHIFT)
00383 #define SMC_TIMINGS_TWB(value)     (SMC_TIMINGS_TWB_MASK & ((value) << SMC_TIMINGS_TWB_SHIFT))
00384 #define SMC_TIMINGS_RBNSEL_SHIFT   28
00385 #define SMC_TIMINGS_RBNSEL_MASK    (0x7 << SMC_TIMINGS_RBNSEL_SHIFT)
00386 #define SMC_TIMINGS_RBNSEL(value)  (SMC_TIMINGS_RBNSEL_MASK & ((value) << SMC_TIMINGS_RBNSEL_SHIFT))
00387 #define SMC_TIMINGS_NFSEL          BV(31)
00388 /*\}*/
00389 
00393 /*\{*/
00394 #define SMC_MODE_READ_MODE            BV(0)
00395 #define SMC_MODE_WRITE_MODE           BV(1)
00396 #define SMC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_SHIFT      4
00397 #define SMC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_MASK       (0x3 << SMC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_SHIFT)
00398 #define   SMC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_DISABLED (0x0 << SNC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_SHIFT)
00399 #define   SMC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_FROZEN   (0x2 << SNC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_SHIFT)
00400 #define   SMC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_READY    (0x3 << SNC_MODE_EXNW_MODE_SHIFT)
00401 #define SMC_MODE_BAT                  BV(8)
00402 #define SMC_MODE_DBW                  BV(12)
00403 #define SMC_MODE_TDF_CYCLES_SHIFT     16
00404 #define SMC_MODE_TDF_CYCLES_MASK      (0xf << SMC_MODE_TDF_CYCLES_SHIFT)
00405 #define SMC_MODE_TDF_CYCLES(x)        (SMC_MODE_TDF_CYCLES_MASK & ((x) << SMC_MODE_TDF_CYCLES_SHIFT))
00406 #define SMC_MODE_TDF_MODE             BV(20)
00407 /*\}*/
00408 
00409 #endif /* CPU_CM3_SAM3X || CPU_CM3_SAM3U */
00410 
00411 #endif /* SAM3_SMC_H */
